description: Parsec's remote access tech is tested on the most demanding media: games.

script: Start-Process cmd -Args '/c', "sc create Parsec binpath=$dir\pservice.exe DisplayName=Parsec start=auto & sc start Parsec" -Verb RunAs -WindowStyle hidden
Start-Process cmd -Args '/c', "sc stop Parsec & sc delete Parsec" -Verb RunAs -WindowStyle hidden -Wait

notes: We don't persist your Parsec data, they are still storaged in '%APPDATA%\Parsec'.
